```{r}
x <- Animals$body
y <- Animals$brain
plot(x,y)
cor(x,y)
```

```{r}
with(data = Animals, plot(body, brain, log = "xy"))
logbody <- log(x)
logbrain <- log(y)
cor(logbody, logbrain)
```
```{r}
sa <- Animals[order(Animals$body), ] #sort by body weight
tail(sa, n=4)
#dim(sa)
nodino <- sa[-(28:26),]
with(data = nodino, cor(log(body), log(brain)))
with(data = Animals, cor(log(body), log(brain)))
```
